title: The Dark Horror Orchestra
description: Dive into fear with 'The Dark Horror Orchestra' - 15 full tracks, 17 flawless loops, and a blend of orchestral classics, cellos, and strings perfect for horror and thriller games.
longDescription:
For years, I've been immersed in music production, working in the realms of cinema and film. I possess a collection of high-quality music in various libraries. My interest has now shifted to game music. Prior to creating this album, I spent hours learning Unreal Engine through tutorials, understanding how and where music is needed. I reached out to game developers, and within this album, you'll find lengthy tracks along with short loop options and solos of various instruments – a plethora of music cues to enhance your projects. I claim that these compositions will add joy to your games. Additionally, all music is YouTube-clear for your video use. Feel free to incorporate them into your content.

My website: https://tuncalicioglu.web.app/


Youtube Album "The Dark Horror Orchestra": https://youtu.be/dixbdKtNzlc

(I've uploaded the entire album, you can listen to it, but the high-quality versions and seamless loop versions are exclusively available within this package.)


"The Dark Horror Orchestra"

Step into the realm of darkness and suspense with 'The Dark Horror Orchestra,' an exceptional collection of spine-chilling music meticulously crafted for game developers aiming to elevate their horror and thriller gaming experiences. This hauntingly immersive music pack features 15 full tracks and 17 flawless loops, meticulously composed to instill a sense of dread and anticipation in players. From ominous orchestral swells to sinister cello melodies and haunting string arrangements, each composition is carefully designed to evoke a visceral response, heightening the tension and atmosphere within the game environment.

Drawing inspiration from dark, satanic elements, 'The Dark Horror Orchestra' delves deep into the depths of fear, offering a diverse range of musical motifs and textures perfectly suited for creating immersive and unsettling gameplay moments. Whether you're navigating through shadowy corridors, facing off against otherworldly adversaries, or unraveling the mysteries of a haunted landscape, this music pack provides the perfect sonic backdrop to captivate players and keep them on the edge of their seats.

Crafted with meticulous attention to detail and optimized for seamless integration with game development platforms such as Unreal Engine, 'The Dark Horror Orchestra' empowers game developers with the tools they need to transport players into a world of terror and suspense. Elevate your gaming experience and leave a lasting impression on players with the atmospheric depth and immersive soundscapes of 'The Dark Horror Orchestra.



🎼 Musical Journey:

Embark on a 26-minute sonic odyssey across 15 full-length tracks, each a testament to the unwavering commitment to musical excellence. Let the symphony guide you through a mesmerizing landscape of emotions and sonic landscapes.

🔍 Seamless Loop Integration:

Featuring 17 seamlessly looped sections, our music pack provides an immersive experience, allowing game developers to seamlessly integrate these masterpieces into their projects. Elevate your gaming experience with the timeless beauty of orchestral music.

🎻 Orchestral Mastery:

Crafted with care in a high-quality home studio, 'The Dark Horror Orchestra' represents my dedication to orchestral excellence. Experience the rich tones of a full orchestra, making for a memorable auditory journey.

🎮 For Game Developers:

Designed with game developers in mind, we present "The Dark Horror Orchestra" as a resource for enhancing gaming soundscapes. Download and incorporate our symphony into your creations, adding a touch of unparalleled grandeur to your gaming worlds.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 15 unique tracks 
  • 17 tracks of seamless loops
  • High quality orchestral elements


Number of Audio Wavs: 32

Number of Audio Cues: 32

Sample rate / bit rate: 48,000 Hz / 24 Bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 26:14

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
